workshopEvents.description: The competition celebrates poetry, encouraging participants to showcase their creativity and captivate audiences. It aims to inspire self-expression while recognizing and rewarding outstanding talent.

A Gwalior city-level speech competition inviting students to articulate their vision for Viksit Bharat @2047. Participants will deliver impactful speeches, emphasizing the role of youth in building a progressive and developed Bharat.

It's the Clash of Wits and Wisdom! An event that allows the participant's to present their veiws on the educational, cultural and innovative topics and themes, showcasing the might of effective communication and intellectual argumentation. Join TCS in Aarunya to celebrate the worth of words.
